EmailTemplate.textOnly: February 18, 2021 Who Doesn’t Want More Sales? Did you know that our new Lokahi podcast <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?ContentId=7b7b476a-4afc-49d4-948c-861950a4934b#/doccenter/8ef384b5-b3bb-424b-823f-729a41e48366/doc/%252Fdd196e06dc-3738-d46d-9523-f4780ed862c3%252Flf6f26daca-545d-4532-a19e-5cca50f60a96/grid/?anchorId=00b8d308-fef8-4de8-80ed-82e7417c33a1]]> is made by sales for sales? Available now on Seismic, Lokahi is a fun and engaging podcast series that lets you hear the latest and greatest sales strategies from some of the most experienced folks around who have been successfully selling the NCR Hospitality portfolio for decades. Who doesn’t want to get more sales? If you do, check out a recent episode, Fireside Chat with Scott Wakely <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/x5/doccenter.aspx?ContentId=7b7b476a-4afc-49d4-948c-861950a4934b#/doccenter/8ef384b5-b3bb-424b-823f-729a41e48366/doc/%252Fdd196e06dc-3738-d46d-9523-f4780ed862c3%252Flf03f8ff9c-c531-461a-bc02-e2c907a90b48//?mode=view&parentPath=sessionStorage]]>, in which Vic Martinez sits down with Scott Wakely to discuss timeless sales tactics you can utilize today to close even more deals. Contactless Just Got Better! We are introducing two exciting new features in NCR MobilePay – Text2Pay and updates to Aloha Stored Value for even more convenience, while helping improve the contactless experience. Aloha Stored Value Consumers can now use Aloha Stored Value gift cards to pay for the total check amount or apply a partial payment to the check. Also, multiple ASV cards can be combined to cover the total check balance, so now guests can pay how they want to pay with these flexible new features: Text2Pay Text2Pay provides the added convenience for guests to pay remotely for call in orders. It’s so simple that all the operator has to do is press the Text2Pay button and a text is sent to the customer’s phone with the NCR Mobile Pay check link or code to pay their bill securely and conveniently. When guests arrive to pick up their orders they can quickly grab their order and go! Payments Training for Customers Help your customers better understand Aloha with NCR Payment Solutions through the training courses NCR is presenting on 5 different topics in February. Please share the information below with your customers about the live training that’s upcoming. They can also listen to the recorded webinars when it’s most convenient for them.
